about_the_game:
You are a Recruit with big tits and I will see you are properly punished!

Truncheon Titties is a Dark Medieval Porn game centered around exhibitionism, big ole titties, abuse of authority, blowjobs, spanking, bullying and revenge.

This demo is the first 20% of the game.

You play as refugee Hilda, entering the Great City after days of walking.
Joining the Royal Guard, Hilda is thrust into a malignant world of criminal gangs and an abusive royal hierarchy.

Hilda trains as a recruit, patrols the streets, and is sent in undercover to engage in her rather unique skill-set.
Fight against the criminal scum, work your way through the ranks of the Royal Guard and make your choices.

What will you do? Show your tits or swing your truncheon?

Hilda can choose from around 65 sexual choices:
  • Take your rightful place and embrace Aphrodite, or
  • Go to war as Athena and emphatically refuse with your fist!

Just Arrest him or Bash his Head in First?
Hilda can choose from around 30 good/evil choices:
  • Defend the rights of the citizen with honor, or
  • Swing your Truncheon until the blood mist is satisfied!

Truncheon Titties has 4270 individual image renders.
The game has 55 short sexual animation loops of blowjobs, handjobs and a variety of sexual positions.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game explores a moral choice and yes/no system allowing the player to decide whether to agree or disagree to consensual sexual positions.

This might involve exposing your character's breasts or engaging in consensual sex acts such as handjobs, blowjobs, vaginal sex and anal sex with male characters. 

All sexual acts can be declined by the player, usually involving a violent form of self-defense. E.g slapping your groper, or even punching/kicking/wrestling to get away. The player always gets away if they so choose, there is no forced sexual content. 

The player has moral choices around violence, specifically in her role as a Royal Guard. She interrogates and arrests criminals using her wooden stick Truncheon. The player gets to choose whether to engage in excessive, cruel, revenge-like violent actions (e.g. kicking a suspect whilst they are tied up), or they can choose to use minimal force to arrest the subject and gain honor by not hurting them. 

Another form of violent content in the game involves the player deciding to intercede and help out someone in need (e.g. you see a fellow Guard being attacked in the street). You can choose to witness the violence (e.g victim being punched etc), or you can run in and save them, usually by directly attacking/fighting with their aggressors. 

The last violent content is the moral choice to kill or murder the various male characters in the game that treated your character poorly. You can choose to arrest these criminals (no killing) or engage in a Revenge Killing. These murders a product of the characters grief and difficult journey, but always are in the hands of the player.
